tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited doctor due to rupture of fallopian tube during my ectopic pregnancy. It was an emergency as I was 4weeks pregnant. I knew I was in safe hands. Admitted in the hospital at 9am with complaints of excruciating pain in the stomach and operation was conducted at 4:40pm. She had even arranged for an anaesthetist from a different hospital who was extremely skilled, as I had an existing cardiological problem. The operation went well and I recovered within 2 days. 0 post operative complications. She had saved my life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very kind and friendly Doctor. She has an aura that is compassionate and calms you despite any tension. She made it very simple and helped with all the doubts, guided with gestational diabetes as well. I would recommend anyone to her as she is extremely reliable, compassionate, patient and protects the patient and supports normal delivery. I had a normal delivery and even on Sunday she visited me. During postpartum as well she helped me emotionally over whatsapp message too. *** ** *** **** ******. Me and my husband loved visiting the far hospital only for Dr Prajual ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I met Dr. Prajual S Hegde in Apollo Cradle Koramangala for my wife's pregnancy. She is highly competent while dealing maternity related issues.
She takes care any situation very calmly and keeps on boosting the patient as well at the same time.
In this entire journey of delivery she guided us very well . She is very informative and  generally doesn't be in hurry at any point of time even if you take her little extra time . We are extremely blessed that you were part of this journey with us to make it successful. Me and my wife sincerely express our deepest gratitude and thank from bottom of our heart. Thank you so much !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She has saved my life. I have a genetic cardiac condition. When my fallopian tube ruptured due to ectopic pregnancy, she wasn't late to do immediate surgery. she took all precautions and even summoned doctors from other hospitals to have a discussion due to my prevailing condition. After my surgery, within few hours, I had started walking and things were extremely smooth. Not a single complications did I feel. The best thing is she has lots of patience to listen to your problem. She treated me to be someone of her own and provided with lots and lots of emotional support. Thank you doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited this doctor to consult my wife's pregnancy. She is 5 weeks pregnant and doctor did the ultrasound without asking anything *** ********** ***** ******* **** *** *********** **** **** ** ****** ********* **** ********* **** ****** ***** *** we are in dailema if there is a problem with baby's development and she didn't clarify that and again did a blood test for Rs 2500 without including necessary test needed during pregnancy like HIV. * **** *** **** ***** ** ******** ******* ******Not at all recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
An Excellent Gynaecologist, who Completely Cares her patient and the baby to the Core in times of pregnency and in delivery as well
Because of your professionalism and great smiles, I felt like I was in good hands of God and that gave us peace of mind towards the big day(Delivery) I feel so blessed to know you and have you as my doctor,Thanks Doc

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr Prajual during my pregnancy. I have visited so many other doctors *** ** *** *** ** *** ***** She has this serene calming effect on you that no matter how or what stress you have it just dissipates in no time. I had a cyst during pregnancy but she was the only one who assured me that I do not have to overthink about it and things would be fine. I delivered during lockdown in April. and she was available even through the last trimester during lockdown via text. I was diagnosed with high BP on last check up and she took all necessary precaution and stayed back late in the hospital until my scan results came to make sure that the baby is doing well too. I delivered a baby boy and he contracted a lung infection and I was extremely low but she gave me the emotional support I needed. Pandemic times did not allow any visitor. But her emotional support helped me a lot. *** ** *** **** ****** ** ********* *** **** *** I would highly recommend and have recommended her to many of my friends. I owe a lot to her for her due diligence and nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Labor and Delivery,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Happy with Dr Prajual S Hegde

I would really like to recommend Dr Prajual. She is very friendly and caring. she will listen to our queries very carefully and provide valuable suggestions. It was my first pregnancy and I got very good treatment, care and support from her. In case of any emergency she is always available on time. She made my  whole journey of pregnancy easy and happy 😊. She is incredible and lovable doctor with atmost care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i consulted the Dr during pregnancy and she delivered by baby. Very friendly Dr. Mine was a high risk pregnancy but she was very nice and guided me well through out my pregnancy and even after delivery. Dr has positive vibes. one can blindly trust the Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would recommend Prajula Ma'am if anyone is looking forward to ,  It was great experience for both of us during my wife maternity and after baby, Prajula understands the patient very well and discuss the things in detail with no hurry. It's great to see such doctor sharing right information's related to concerned issues and suggest relevant diagnosis procedures.

review: *** ** *** ** *** *** We have been trying for baby almost a year . after that we went and meet Dr.Prajwal . Due to PCOD issue i was unable to conceive . So doctor immediately start with my treatment and within 5 months of treatment i conceived, with her guidance and positive vibe my pregnancy period went so smoothly . she is always there whenever I need her guidance . very active and very fast on replying on phone as well .I don't have enough words to thank her . My daughter is one year old , and i always remember Dr. Prajwal, without her i couldn't have become mother .
